message.pattern: <@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: <@REGEXP("Enabling fast FPU save and restore.+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: <@REGEXP("Enabling unmasked SIMD FPU exception support.+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: <@REGEXP(".*NR Log Phy Mask Trig IRR Pol Stat Dest Deli Vect:"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: <@REGEXP(".+host bus clock speed is \S+ MHz."):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: <@REGEXP("Enabling the CPU's according to the ACPI table"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: <@REGEXP("allocated \d+ pages and \d+ bhs reserved for the highmem bounces"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: <@REGEXP("TCP: Treason uncloaked! Peer \S+ shrinks window \S+ Repaired."):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: <@REGEXP("\w+-fs: mounted filesystem with ordered data mode."):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: <@REGEXP(".+ rejecting I/O to dead device"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: <@REGEXP("No module symbols loaded - kernel modules not enabled."):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: <@REGEXP(".+ warning: maximal mount count reached, running e2fsck is recommended"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: <@REGEXP(".+: Cannot enable port \d+. Maybe the USB cable is bad.+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: <@REGEXP("pnp: .+ ioport range \S+ could not be reserved"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: <@REGEXP("pnp: .+ ioport range \S+ has been reserved"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: <@REGEXP("process .+ is using obsolete setsockopt SO_BSDCOMPAT"):msg@>
